item.description:
The Hi Hat
3 Davol Square Providence, RI 02903
9:15pm - 12:45am

October 29 - Friday
BRASS ATTACK
Cover: $5.00 (from Hi-Hat website)
http://www.thehihat.c...

If anyone is planning on dinner or drinks before the music, please post so we can meet earlier! Free appetizers are available from 5-7 on Friday's night so anyone wishing to go earlier let me know i will meet you there and get a table for group with a Meetup sign so you can find us.

Dancing, dining, social fun... let's get some guys to come to get all the women dancing.. this band is fun. Place is great venue..

group.name: Mingle with singles 45+ Socializing and dancing

item.name: Brass Attack at the Hi-Hat Friday
